Articles.Content:
they could add a kind of observatory in the mountains west of the KSC that has a button in the Space center view.

like this

It's planned. You're going to need to use the observatory to discover planets in career mode. Hopefully, they only discover big planets and you'll have to send orbital telescopes and/or probes to discover moons and smaller bodies.

Either way, it should be really good and would probably look good over there on them mountains...if not a bit far away from KSC proper.
